features: Quick release handle for effortless above floor cleaning. Attach the crevice tool or dusting brush to the end of the handle for cleaning upholstery, windows and other hard to reach places.Specific uses:hard floor,carpet,dual action
Powerful all floor suction extracts dirt and hair from hard floors and carpets ease. It’s 10.5” wide cleaning path gets the job done quickly
Lightweight at only 7.7 pounds with its compact and featherweight design this vacuum can store in any space in your home and be carried anywhere
Contains one washable filter which can be rinsed and left to dry for no maintenance costs
Includes a crevice tool and dusting brush which snaps on the vacuum and are within reach at any time during cleaning
body.description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier. Experience the ultimate cleaning power with Eureka Airspeed compact bagless upright vacuum cleaner. With its lightweight and compact design, this powerful vacuum effortlessly tackles dirt, dust, and debris on any surface and is perfect for apartment. The detachable handle and flexible hose make it easy to reach every nook and cranny, leaving your home spotless, while the large-capacity dust cup means you can clean for longer without interruption, making it ideal for large apartments. With its superior suction power and deep cleaning capabilities, this vacuum is the best hardwood floor cleaner machine on the market! Don't settle for less when it comes to cleaning your home. Choose the best vacuum cleaner out there and enjoy a sparkling clean home like never before! If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886. Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks. Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Here Comes the Eureka AirSpeed Ultra-Lightweight Vacuum Ultra-Lightweight yet powerful Perfect for Dorm room/ Small apartment/ Other small areas

As Light as Air This upright only weighs 7.7 pounds! Ultra-lightweight & compact design make this vacuum easy to carry, maneuver & store Decent Capacity, Easy Empty Dust Cup Don’t let its slight frame fool you because it can still hold up to 1.7 liters of dirt. And it's pretty easy to clean up the dust cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little vac!
reviews.reviewText: Works great in my little apt. Has great suction. Finds dirt I didn't know was there! Lightweight. Easy assembly. Works on hardwood, tile and low pile rugs. And a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best light duty vacuum I've used!
reviews.reviewText: Pros: This vacuum has the suction/power to clean very well on all surfaces: tile, wood, furniture and carpet. It is very lightweight. Good attachments. Super easy to clean. You can even take the canister completely off and apart so it can be washed, just dry thoroughly before using again.Cons: It's loud. Because it's so lightweight, it can be difficult to maneuver when using the attachments. The hose doesn't go back to original shape/size, material issue. Short power cord, only good for one room.Even given these cons, I love this vacuum and am very happy with it, especially the price! I'm so happy with it that I bought a second one to have one upstairs and one on main floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little vacuum for a studio or one bed apartment. Great for those with sore back issues!
reviews.reviewText: Overall, it's a nice little unit.Very lightweight. Simple to use.The small brush head is perfect for small areas under coffee tables and between the legs of end tables and square back kitchen chairs.Overall vacuuming performance is good. It sucks the deap dust and dirt out of the carpet. It picks up my 2 foot long golden locks well. It does a great job on the kitchen floor as well.The cons are these...Hair gets caught in the little basket at the top of the dust bin. It builds up and blocks the dust bunnies from hitting the can. If I vacuum 2ce a week it won't clog on me before I finish my 1 bed apt. It's a minor inconvenience and is expected due to the length of my hair and the facts I am losing it everywhere I go the last few years. Any vacuum would eventually succumb.Also, the edge cleaner action on the vacuum head is not the best. In Spite of the fact it has great floor suction. You'll find yourself undoing the hose and going over baseboards with the brush or the little narrow tool or simply w/o an attachment. All 3 serve a great purpose and do their jobs well. Just don't expect to get all the edge dirt on the passes. It'll leave the most stubbornly far away in the edges specs of debris.I am a disabled vet with L4 and L5 ruptured and repaired. It's light enough I can use it w/o straining my back at all and it fits in all the little spots other vacuums will not. Less furniture scooting and lifting.If you want to reach the top valance on the mini blinds you can't. The hose is too short. I pick up the entire vacuum no problem to reach high. Put it on a square back chair. I have a 3 stepper I put it on the top as I stand on the middle stair. About 80 bucks for a great 3 stepper ladder.Overall it's a great little unit that outperforms it's size. I would not recommend this for any more than a 600 square foot space. Because of the small brush head it'd take a long time to vacuum a 2 bedroom on up. It would make a fantastic upstairs exclusively vacuum. The hose is wayyy too short for it to be used as a car vac.My recommendation is buy it w/o fear if my description fits your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Little Workhorse
reviews.reviewText: For the low price, I had my doubts. But I just recently moved into a formally hoarded house that is still holding onto a millions years of dust, dirt, and cobwebs everywhere. This vacuum has been doing great! it doesn't feel like the suction is strong, but canister after full canister of filth proves otherwise. It does great on thick carpeting, as well as hardwood/tile/linoleum.The only thing annoying is the short(ish) cord, but the lightweight nature of the entire unit, as well as the ease of use more than makes up for it. In truth, if I want to keep going without having to re-plug it into a closer outlet, I could just attached a dedicated extension cord to make it easier for me. The canister is not huge, and mine fills quickly due to the level of dirt in this house. It works better if you empty it at the two-thirds fill point.Other than those two minor things, I would highly recommend this model if you need something affordable and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum is the perfect size It is easy to store. It is very lightweight but it has a powerful suction capability it picks up the little stuff very fast and it does great . I wanted a vacuum for my staircase that was lightweight and easy to move and this is perfect. I was happy with the price and what it has to offer. It doesn't have all the fancy stuff like others do but it serves its purpose and does a great job vacuuming without all the bells and whistles it gets the job done. Very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It sucks. Both figuratively and literally.
reviews.reviewText: So it does suck up dust and what not well enough to get a couple stars. But the fact that it’s SO lightweight (due to it being made out of cheap plastic) is an issue even though it’s a nice quality to have for transportation. I have to push all of my weight into the vacuum as I’m using it because it’s so light and the suction won’t suffice without a little more weight pushing it into the carpet. And the cord, goodness gracious I can’t even vacuum my whole living room from one outlet. Mind you I live in a 900sqft home so it’s not a large room. Lastly if you’re a person of tall stature and it pains you to be bent forward I’d recommend looking into other vacuums. It’s an average height id say but there’s no adjustment option to add height and for some like myself that may be troublesome for their back pain. Besides those issues it’s a usable, efficient enough vacuum. The price wasn’t too horrible and I’ll likely be able to get enough life out of it before I buy a better more expensive vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Plugged it in and instead of sucking was blowing everywhere then sparks started coming out of the plastic bit at the bottom. Freaked me out. Nearly started a fire. I notice another person had the same experience! Also comes with a American plug so you need an adapter in the UK. I'd avoid this like the plague.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My brother had this delivered, on arrival, realises it needed a European plug, orederd one, and on using it, started sparking,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After no more than 3 minutes of use, the hoover started sparking and smoking. I’m hoping the seller contacts me regarding a refund as I am currently unable to find a way to contact them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Please do not buy, I bought this, it was not a uk plug, so I purchased a world plug to use with this product, started to hoover it quickly smelt of burning, I heard the plug socket make a noise, next minute there was a pop sound,flames then smoke, I had to run downstairs turn all my electrics off, my children had to open their bedroom windows and we all had to come down stairs, due to the smoke and smell that also set my fire alarm off.I called amazon about this, all they have done is make a refund, its disgusting.Please do not buy this situation could have been worse, its scared and traumatised my children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Not valid for UK. It's not acceptable that it is sold in amazon UK
reviews.reviewText: Not valid for UK: US plug and 125VAmazon UK should npot be selling this product!!!
